title: What are the best resources to study electronic devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: With respect to circuit perspective I feel Fundamentals of Microelectronics by Behzad Razavi is too good. In support to that,you can refer Electronic Devices and Curcuit Theory by Nashelsky. To understand physical behaviour of electronic devices you can read Solid State Electronic Devices by Ben Streetman & Sanjay Banerjee. Good luck :)
